EmailTemplate.name: Acceptance Letter
EmailTemplate.subject: Acceptance Letter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Opportunity.CreatedDate}
Dear {!Opportunity.Name},
I am very please that you have accepted the Head of School's offer and enrolled {!Opportunity.Student_Name__c} at St Andrew's Cathedral School commencing in {!Opportunity.Enrolment_Date__c}.
I wish to acknowledge receipt of the payment of the non-refundable Enrolment Fee of $2,500.00.
I look forward to {!Opportunity.Student_Name__c}'s contribution to the life of the school and wish him/her every success for his/her years with us.
Yours Sincerely
Bruce Perry BEd, Dip Teach Registrar
